short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SiteSwitcher. Easily switch between sites. You can change URLs on the fly using regular expressions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SiteSwitcher. Easily switch between sites. You can change URLs on the fly using regular expressions.
Example use cases:
1. Switch to different environment/domain of the same system (e.g. DEV, QA, PROD). The switch will save the view (the path in the URL). This is especially handy for web development.
2. Switch between the same view (map coordinates) in maps applications (e.g. Google Maps, OSM, WikiMap, Geocaching)
3. Switch between the same search in different search engines (e.g. Google, Bing)
